description: Leading industry training in comuter programming and data science, including month-long graduate schemes for banks in the global top 10.
Teaching advanced Python, SQL and Tableau, including Python packages such as Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Plotly, Scikit-learn, Tensorflow and PySpark for big data.
Teaching JavaScript, HTML and CSS, cloud technology such as AWS.
Designing and delivering masterclasses in topics such as data visualisation and machine learning.
Collaborating with stakeholders to create bespoke technical courses, tailored to the company's training needs.
Creating learning materials including code challenges, tests and hackathons.
Teaching courses online, in person, and hybrid, harnessing online teaching technology such as breakout rooms and online chat features.
Directing and coaching teaching assistants and course facilitators.
